players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden death. We need to stay focused on finding out who did this and bringing them to justice."

You: "I agree with Diana. Let's try to gather as much information as we can during this discussion phase to help us identify the culprit. If anyone has any suspicious observations or suspicions, now is the time to share them."

Bob: "I support Alice and Diana's call for open discussion. Let's try to remember any unusual behaviors or conversations we might have witnessed during the past few days that could help us identify the culprit."

Diana: "Based on my observations, I noticed that Charlie seemed unusually quiet and withdrawn during the past few days. He also avoided interacting with me directly. While it's important to remember that this alone doesn't necessarily mean he was the culprit, it does..."

You: "I remember Charlie mentioning to me during the last village gathering that he had recently received some threatening letters. He seemed quite shaken by it and asked me to keep it confidential. While I don't want to jump to conclusions, this information might be relevant to our..."

Bob: "Based on the information we've shared, it seems that Charlie may have had some enemies within our community. I propose that we keep a closer eye on each other during this game and report any suspicious activities or conversations to ensure the safety of our village."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Alice: "I remember Charlie mentioning to me during the last village gathering that he had recently received some threatening letters. He seemed quite shaken by it and asked me to keep it confidential. While I don't want to jump to conclusions, this information might be relevant to our..."

You: "Based on the information we've shared, it seems that Charlie may have had some enemies within our community. I propose that we keep a closer eye on each other during this game and report any suspicious activities or conversations to ensure the safety of our village."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana

You killed Charlie.

Day 1 begins.
